title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 414.3 - Additional penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 414.3 - Additional penalties

State Regulations

Penalties as established in this Part shall be additional
and cumulative to all other penalties or remedies existing for violations of
article 28 of the Public Health Law and of the rules and regulations
promulgated pursuant to such article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
414.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
